name: NOTHING
description: Just a haircut. No shampoo, no massage, no nothing. Just a haircut.

name: SHAMPOO
description: Add an extra layer of pampering to your grooming experience with our optional shampoo wash. Indulge in ultimate relaxation and leave with a clean, revitalized feel.

name: SHAMPOO & MASSAGE
description: Experience the ultimate relaxation with our optional shampoo wash and massage. Elevate your grooming session to a spa-like indulgence.
